creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
The latest PublicationConfiguration version 448167 under getResourceTypeNames()
calls getFactory(), which always throws an execption. This is a new bug to this
revision.

This code is called when a new publication is created and the user logs in for
the first time and is prompted to create the index page.

creator: ragaller@apache.org
text:
(In reply to comment #0)
> The latest PublicationConfiguration version 448167 under getResourceTypeNames()
> calls getFactory(), which always throws an execption. This is a new bug to this
> revision.
> 
> This code is called when a new publication is created and the user logs in for
> the first time and is prompted to create the index page.

Same thing here.

When I try to insert an asset/ressource within bitflux in my publication based
on the default publication an almost identical error occurs as soon as the asset
window pops up (the error is written inside the asset dialog window).
It should work again. The error was due to an accidential commit for bug 39899.
creator: andreas@apache.org
